Line11.102596: Heed my warning and stop them! It must remain sealed!
Line5.102596: It was sealed for a reason! And now the pig-headed beasts are trying to force it open!
Line3.102596: I can feel it...a great calamity is about to unfold in the northern reaches. The door is in danger.
Line1.102596: Keep it! I am not after your money. Just your ear.
